dataRoles.description:
Use geo coordinates [latitude|longitude] to map points (e.g., cities), multiple geo coordinates, space seperated ([latitude|longitude] [latitude|longitude]), to map lines (e.g., shipping routes), or mapping attributes (e.g., country name, country code) to reference areas (e.g., countries, states). Check "Mapping info for unmapped areas" in Formatting->Map & projection->Map to display a map's mapping attributes.
 Assign multiple fields to create a drillable hierarchy. Hierarchies that consist of mapping attributes (e.g., continent->country name) will automatically be displayed. To create custom hierarchy nodes by combining mapping attributes (e.g. sales regions) use data mapping "Hierarchy definition"
dataRoles.name: country

dataRoles.description: Use to assign colors by group, instead of individually or by measure value. Will be used for both points and areas.
dataRoles.name: legend

dataRoles.description: Use to color areas by measure value.
dataRoles.name: measure

dataRoles.description: Use measure to label points or areas.
dataRoles.name: name

dataRoles.description: Use measure for mini charts (circle size or column height).
dataRoles.name: measure_chart

dataRoles.description: Use to define components (mapping attributes, e.g. country codes) of custom hierarchy nodes (e.g., sales areas). Syntax: attribute|attribute|... (e.g., "BE|NL|LU" to create group benelux). Works with areas only.
dataRoles.name: hierarchy

dataRoles.description: Use to change map dynamically. Assigned measure will override selected map in Formatting->Map & projection->Map->Map. Use case: switch a more detailed map when drilling down a hierarchy (e.g., go from world map to US map when drilling down from the country to a single US state). Reference either map code or map name as in Formatting->Map & projection->Map->Map.
dataRoles.name: map

dataRoles.description: Image to be used instead of marker
dataRoles.name: image

dataRoles.description: Hidden measure, can be used for sorting
dataRoles.name: hidden

map.description: Map to be used. Choose from two world maps, maps of single continents, many country maps, and two level 3 maps (US counties and German rural districts).

projection_no_mercator.description: Projection to be used. Options depend on selected map. Some maps come with tailored projections for better display (e.g., US, France, Spain)
